children.value: The practice of beekeeping was introduced to Sri Lanka around 1940, by the then State Department of Agriculture. But is still a relatively small industry. Sri Lanka's annual bee honey production is limited to 25 metric tons, with an additional 150 metric tons imported annually to meet local demand.
